sentence: Service was good staff friendly and helpful
Carl in the Concierge lounge was very attentive
Carl Fuller Jr in the Concierge Lounge provided excellent service
Amazing customer service
Staff was pleasant and room had a great view
Staff were super friendly and extremely helpful from checking in at the check in desk to the kind gentlemen at the concierge and valet parking
The pool staff and pool lounge was very relaxing and accommodating
Staff is trained to move quickly to watch and anticipate a guests needs thereby making for a very efficient operation
special shout out though to Carl Fuller in the Concierege Lounge amazing assistance at one of the better Concierge lounges I have seen in a Mariot
Staff was very friendly and helpful
Paid a little more for club level food was nice Ashley David were great service in club
Room service staff on phone still charged us for food we never got and i had to have the front desk remove charge the next day
The process to correct this was not done well staff was not attentive
Worst Valet Service Ever
the room service to go is a new experience for me and being asked to come down and get it or pay 5 for it to be brought up seems tacky but whatever
The pool area was ok but in need of an upgrade and there was no polside cocktail or food service
Had to change room initially allocated due to building works due to occur unknown by reception staff just a note in the room when we arrived
Only downside is valet is a bit pricey at 32 night but the people running it were professional and helpful so at least you get good service
Disappointing service although nice property
When checking in the customer service at the front desk was lousy and their attitude is not customer friendly at all

To make sure the reservation was kept and not cancelled my Assistant called the hotel on Monday morning Tampa time 1000 to inform them of my plans and to make sure I could check in on Tuesday morning my reservation and Mariot members number was quoted to the Hotel staff and my assistant was assured that the room would be available even if I had to wait a short time due to rooms being cleaned etc
